nodes.text: Monongs were hairy creatures. While pretending to be involved in slavery in hopes of boarding an Imperial Gozanti-class cruiser, Hera Syndulla once compared a Wookiee to an "oversized monong."
While training a group of rookie Imperial cadets, Lieutenant Currahee referred to them as "flea-bitten monongs."

Monongs were first mentioned in Star Wars Rebels: Spark of Rebellion, the one-hour series premiere for the animated television series Star Wars Rebels. In the first draft of the movie's script, Syndulla used the term "ape." This was later changed to momong, a monkey-like creature native to Wasskah that was first seen in Star Wars: The Clone Wars. In the final version of the script, "momong" evolved into "monong," thus creating a new species.
